title: (x) Font idenitification please. - probably modified FF DIN Condensed, various suggestions {Riccardo, Alexandru C, Jörg G}
content:
Hi all,

Does anyone know the fonts used here (see link)

[http://asset2.itsnicethat.com/store/images/000/004/458/main/jb\_big.gif?1...](http://web.archive.org/web/20130208081727/http:/asset2.itsnicethat.com/store/images/000/004/458/main/jb_big.gif?1267437592 "http://asset2.itsnicethat.com/store/images/000/004/458/main/jb\_big.gif?1267437592")

-'FOUR' is the one I would like to know,  
The others would be a bonus.

Thanks in advance.
author: Caldecourt

comments.content:
One for the bonus:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/studiocharlie/superpois/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130208081727/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/studiocharlie/superpois/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/studiocharlie/superpois/")

Also several similar at Fontstruct.com

Hello

Similar fonts:

1. For Four

[http://www.ffonts.net/RicksAmericanNF.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20130208081727/http:/www.ffonts.net/RicksAmericanNF.font "http://www.ffonts.net/RicksAmericanNF.font")

or

[http://www.ffonts.net/LewishamShadowII.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20130208081727/http:/www.ffonts.net/LewishamShadowII.font "http://www.ffonts.net/LewishamShadowII.font")

or

[http://www.ffonts.net/Malabars-Tryout.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20130208081727/http:/www.ffonts.net/Malabars-Tryout.font "http://www.ffonts.net/Malabars-Tryout.font")

2. For point

[http://www.ffonts.net/National-First-Font-Dotted.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20130208081727/http:/www.ffonts.net/National-First-Font-Dotted.font "http://www.ffonts.net/National-First-Font-Dotted.font")

Alex.

The first (FOUR) seems to be Fontshop’s somewhat weird not-so-flat-sided interpretation of DIN Engschrift:

[http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff\_din\_ot\_condensed\_bold/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130208081727/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_din_ot_condensed_bold/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff\_din\_ot\_condensed\_bold/")
Thanks guys, your help is greatly appreciated.
